column1: Smoque BBQ////Pretty decent bbq.  I came here with high expectations
column2: so this review may be a bit unfair.  Tried the Sliced Brisket
column3: St Louis Ribs and Texas Sausage.  Thought the ribs were slighty tough
column4: the brisket was intensely smoky and needed more salt or seasoning in the rub
column5: and was hoping for more of a kick from the Texas Sausage.  It was all good but didn't blow my mind.  I'd choose Green Street Smoked Meats or Twin Anchors for best BBQ in Chicago.
